title: More than 15 interpretations of seeing naked in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin: naked in a dream for a single woman and the interpretation of a dream of naked without clothes

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about being naked in a dream? Being naked in a dream is one of the visions that many people see in a dream, but they do not realize what this vision means in a dream? Its interpretation varies between whether it was seen by a man or a young man, or whether it was an unmarried girl, married, or pregnant. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the interpretations. The correct one. Seeing naked in a dream. The interpretation of seeing Nabulsi naked in a dream is that he is getting rid of his clothes, this indicates that the dreamer is facing a very fierce and malicious enemy, but he is very close to him and always wants to be able to eliminate him. If one sees in a dream that his clothes have been taken off Completely and that there are a large number of people watching it, this is evidence that the dreamer is hiding a secret and that this secret will soon be revealed. For anyone. When the sleeper sees in his dream that he is standing in front of a large crowd without hiding anything from his body, even his private parts, and is not ashamed of it, this expresses that the dreamer is committing many mistakes and sins openly without shame. Naked in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that all her clothes are falling off and her body is exposed in front of people, this means that this girl is more concerned with her modesty and religion and that she has the ability to act correctly. In front of people. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that all her clothes are falling off and her body is naked, then she is suffering from many serious psychological pressures that exist in this girl’s subconscious. With regard to the girl who sees this nudity in her dream but is completely ashamed of it, it expresses that This girl is trying to get rid of any sin she may have committed. What does being naked in a dream mean to Ibn Sirin? If one sees in a dream that he is the one who takes off all of his clothes until he reaches the point of nudity, this means that there is someone close to you, but in reality he is one of The most hateful and hostile people. . For you.If one sees in a dream that he is at a wedding and that he is taking off his clothes in front of everyone, this is evidence that this person is hiding a secret, but this secret will be revealed in front of everyone. That there is intense hostility around him and he is waiting to be arrested. What is the interpretation of a dream about being naked without clothes? If one sees in a dream that there are people in front of him, but they are not wearing clothes, this means that the dreamer will become aware of something or information about something, and these things will cause him Great inconvenience. If you dream that you see one of your relatives, acquaintances, relatives, or relatives, but he is not wearing any clothes and that he is ashamed in the dream because of this nudity, then this expresses that this person is hiding something from you and wants it. They declare to you and are ashamed of this. I dreamed that I was naked. If one sees in a dream that he appears in front of everyone completely naked of any clothes, but he tries to make the girls ask questions around him, this means that this person will face extreme poverty and dryness in his material. Life soon. As for the person who sees this previous vision and the people around him he focuses

title: Interpretation of water in a dream The meaning of drinking water in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing water in a girl’s dream is for an unmarried woman. The meaning of water in a dream: It indicates a good life, and if one sees water in his house in a dream, he will gain money and happiness. Clean water in a dream indicates justice, and whoever drinks water in a dream will be safe from the enemy. And life will be fruitful ahead of him. Whoever drinks a lot of water in a dream will have a long life. Whoever offers water to the dreamer and his wife is pregnant will give birth to him, and if he brings water in a cup, his wife will become pregnant. If the water is clean, he will receive goodness from his wife and son. If the dreamer walks on water in a dream, this indicates that he is a man of faith or that he is a traveler on the horizon. If the dreamer falls into deep water, he will obtain a share of the world with grace and pleasure. It is possible that in a dream the dreamer looks into the water and sees a good face. Here the subject indicates that he will improve the welfare of his neighbors and family. Fresh water is also food, kindness, lawful, and a good heart. Seeing turbid water in a dream, if the dreamer bathes in it and suffers from some seriousness, then the matter means that he will get rid of it, or if he is sick he will be cured, and if he is a prisoner he is. The water in the dream expresses the good life that the dreamer lives, and it is a sign of total spoils and increased goodness. Besides, a lot of water in a dream is the cheapest price and longevity if the dreamer drinks from it. If an unmarried woman is offered water in a dream, and it is hot, she will experience great distress. On the other hand, water in a dream indicates health, happiness, and an increase in good deeds. Water in a dream is a sign of success in work and trade. Water in general is a sign of knowledge, life, fertility, growth, or prosperity in life. If water comes in a stagnant or corrupt form The dreamer will fall ill, lose her job, or change her religion. As for carrying water in a dream, it means wealth, and for an unmarried woman it means marriage. As for a dream about water for a married woman, it is a sign of pregnancy and an indication of childbirth. If water bursts from the wall in a dream, this is evidence of the dreamer’s sadness over the loss of a brother or friend, or to get rid of Worries. If a woman in a dream sees running water, she will find a job she likes. If she sees that she is drinking water in a dream, the interpretation of the dream depends on the taste of the water. If you drink to the point of saturation, it means that you will satisfy your need or achieve an ambition that you have been seeking for a long time. If the water in the dream tastes bad, this portends bad luck, but if it tastes hot, then your dream warns you of the sadness that may befall you in the future. The coming days. If you see yourself drinking water, but you do not have enough and you want more of it, this symbolizes that there is something that interests you or an ambition that you want to achieve and you are doing everything in your power to cover it. Or achieve it. This dream warns you of greed. Be vigilant because you may be overly ambitious. If you dream that you are drinking dirty water, be careful not to deceive a friend, as this dream may show that you are on a path that is not suitable for you.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing sesame in a dream

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing sesame seeds in a dream. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that indicate goodness, blessings, and abundant nutrition. Interpretations of a dream about sesame: Seeing an unmarried girl sees a plate of sesame seeds and does not eat from it, so someone took it and ate it, and it is a vision that indicates that soon There will be a strong relationship between her and that person. As for a man who dreams that he desperately wants to eat sesame and longs for it but is unable to obtain it, the vision indicates relief from worry, relief, and facilitation of all matters in his life, God willing. Seeing a man in a dream eating sesame seeds This was evidence that he would benefit from his trade. What is the interpretation of a dream about sesame by Ibn Sirin? In general, Ibn Sirin sees that sesame in a dream indicates money that increases and continues to increase slowly daily, because sesame is known to be fatty. A man seeing in a dream that it gives For a woman to see a plate full of sesame seeds, the vision indicates good luck, success, and success in work. If a young man sees in a dream that there is a girl who ate a plate containing sesame seeds, this indicates that he will soon have a beautiful wife and a high degree of integrity in religion, God willing. Seeing a young man in a dream taking a quantity of sesame seeds and giving them to another person is evidence of that young man’s cooperation and good heart, and that God will reward him abundantly. Sesame seeds in a dream. If a young man sees in his dream that a very beautiful woman came to him and gave him a plate full of sesame seeds, and that young man ate it. All of it in the dream, so that woman left it and went away, this indicates that in his life someone will appear to help him obtain a certain wish that he longs for and longs for. Seeing a young man giving a girl in a dream a dish full of sesame seeds and asking her to eat it, but she was not happy She did not like it, so this is evidence that this young man wanted to have a relationship with that. A girl, and does not want or share the same feelings. Sesame in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing herself while sleeping eating sesame seeds and enjoying its taste is evidence that she will give birth to a child of her kind according to what she desires from God. If she wants a boy, she will have a boy. But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she wants to eat sesame and longs for it, but she cannot reach it or reach it, then this indicates her extreme fear of the day of her birth and her fear of something bad. It will happen to her or to the fetus, but this dream is good news that everything will be fine, and God will replace her fear with safety, and she and her child will live. Eating sesame in a dream If someone sees in his dream that he is eating sesame, this is evidence that nourishment, a lot of money, and kindness will go into effect. His life. But if a girl who has never been married sees that she is eating toasted sesame seeds, this is evidence that this girl is in dire need of something and is striving to get it and she will get it soon, and she will be happy with it. If a married woman sees that she is eating sesame seeds in her dream, this A vision indicating the arrival of good news in that woman’s life. Interpretation of eating poison

If a person sees in a dream that he is using a sponge, this indicates the resurrection of some things and reckless actions. A dream of sleeping on a sponge bed in a dream indicates that food is coming to the pioneer, and its source is unknown. Interpretation of seeing a sponge in a dream for NablusSeeing a mattress in A dream indicates marriage to a fair woman. If you see a white sponge in a dream, this indicates a religious wife. Interpretation of a sponge in a dream for a single woman. To see an unmarried girl in a dream on a sponge bed - this indicates marriage in the near future and the life partner she is waiting for. If she sees She is sleeping on a sponge bed and feels comfortable, then this indicates her marriage to a man who has status and high status at work. But if she sees in a dream that she is sleeping on an uncomfortable sponge mattress, this indicates her connection to an uncomfortable person. As for the girl who sees that she is sleeping on a mattress Spongy, and she does not know who owns that mattress, this indicates the high status she has reached. Interpretation of a dream about sponge for a married woman: If a married woman sees inside the dream sitting on a spongy mattress covered with silk, this indicates prosperity in life and a happy life. Seeing her buying a new sponge mattress And it looks wonderful, indicating that her life is about to change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sponge for a pregnant woman: If she sees that she is sleeping on a sponge mattress and feels satisfied with it, this indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful, good male child. As for the vision of buying bedding, this vision is a good omen. If she sees The pregnant woman is selling sponges, this indicates that the pregnancy is not complete. It tells the dreamer of the imminent relief after suffering. And buying a sponge in a dream, is evidence It indicates the high status and prestige that the dreamer will have, and it is a symbol of obtaining lawful money and the extent of sustenance. Improving the condition and treating patients from their diseases is good news. See how a mattress is washed in a woman’s dream. Seeing washing a mattress with a sponge In an unmarried woman’s dream, there is news that things will be resolved and that The dream knight will ask for her hand in marriage. She will see in this marriage happiness, comfort, stability, and good treatment from this husband towards her. As for her sleeping on the sponge and she felt uncomfortable sleeping on it, her dream tells her that someone who does not have good qualities will propose to her, so he should

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about exams and the lack of a solution in the solo room?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an exam and the lack of a solution for single women. Today we will talk about the interpretation of an exam and the lack of a solution in a dream for a single woman, as there are many interpretations that differ from each other depending on the circumstances of the dreamer. We will learn that through this article about all interpretations of sayings and suggestions so that the sleeping person is not distracted and her heart is reassured. Interpretation of a dream about exams and the lack of a single solution. Many prominent interpretive scholars said that seeing exams and not having a solution in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she is unable to bear the many responsibilities assigned to her during this time, which exhausts her greatly, both physically and internally. mentally. Many of the most prominent interpretation experts have also confirmed that seeing an examination and no solution in a woman’s dream indicates that she is doing many things that are greatly wrong, and if she does not stop doing that, she will receive severe punishment from God. Who did these things? Seeing an examination and no solution while a girl is sleeping indicates that she is always very hasty and reckless in making all the important decisions related to her life, whether personal or practical. As many of the most important experts in interpretation have explained, seeing an examination and no solution in a dream of a divorced person indicates He indicates that he goes through many stages of sadness and severe depression resulting from his lack of wisdom and ability to endure the demands of life. Interpretation of a dream about exams and the lack of a single solution by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing an examination and not having a solution in a dream indicates that the dreamer always feels fear and psychological tension. The big one that greatly affects her life and this will lead her to failure in many matters. This is what he did and will also do in the coming periods. The great scholar Ibn Sirin also confirmed that seeing an examination and the absence of a solution in a person’s dream indicates that she is an unreliable person who does not make important decisions and always resorts to others to make the appropriate decision with her. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website A specialist in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about an exam, the lack of a solution, and deception for single people. Many senior interpretation researchers said that seeing exams, inaccuracy, and cheating in a single woman’s dream indicates that she has So many great secrets that no one wants to know, even if they are close to them. Many of the most important interpretation experts have also confirmed that seeing exams, lack of accuracy, and cheating in a girl’s dream indicates that she is a very bad person and that she may do something, right or wrong, to achieve her goals. Interpretation of a dream about an exam and not preparing for it alone. Many prominent interpretation scholars said that seeing an exam and not preparing in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that one of his relatives is suffering from many chronic diseases that led to the approaching term of his term. But if a girl sees in her dream that she is not prepared for the exams, then this A sign that she will face many very big problems and crises

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a boat in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a boat in a dream by Ibn SirinThe boat is the only chance for a drowning man to survive, so he pins all his hopes and his life on this boat, which will lead him to safe distances at sea.The boat in a dreamThe boat in a dream has more than one interpretation, depending on the person’s condition. The interpretation, for example, is a boat in a dream means peace and kindness. Another condition in the dream is that seeing a boat is evidence of a new life full of worship and also evidence of abundance of food and loss of anxiety and sadness. In the case of single people, the boat indicates marriage or obtaining a new job, and if a married woman sees a boat, this indicates that she will give birth to a new baby, and in most cases, the child will be a boy. Below we present all the interpretations of seeing a boat in a dream. The boat in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin, One of the prominent dream interpretation scholars, leaving only his interpretation, dealt with the interpretation of a dream about a boat in a dream as follows: The interpretation of a boat in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a large and abundant source of livelihood. The size of the boat also has a meaning in the dream related to the size of the commodity and the food coming. The larger the boat, the larger the volume of food. When one sees that he is sharing a boat with someone in the water, this means that he will be saved from death or danger in the next period of his life. But if the person gets sick or complains of some pain in his body and sees a boat in a dream This indicates the approach of recovery. The boat running aground, that is, without water, indicates the hypocrisy of the fortuneteller. Seeing a wooden boat over a waterfall and escaping from it means escaping from an imminent danger. If a person dreams in a dream that a dead person has boarded the boat with him, this indicates his high status. If he sees himself getting out of the boat, this shows relief. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. The sinking of a boat or ship and then reaching land indicates damage or loss of money. Seeing the boat breaking indicates a problem with Father because he is the mooring. For someone who sees a boat, it can also indicate excessive money, comfort and ostentation. A fleeting vision of a boat or ship may indicate abandonment of decisions or abandonment of responsibilities that belong to the viewer. If he sees himself towing the boat with a group of pious and righteous people, This indicates the dreamer’s mercy and forgiveness. And whoever sees himself drowning and clinging to the wood of a boat or ship, this indicates anger and torment. And whoever sees himself dead in a boat or ship, this indicates his death in the presence of many people. Seeing a poor person in his dream that he is riding a boat or ship means The end of anxiety, sadness, and poverty. A broken or broken ship indicates adversity. Whoever sees a shipwreck and is a prisoner, this means that he will gain freedom. When the planks of the boat break, this indicates the death of the mother. Interpretation of a boat in a dream for a single woman. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of the boat in a woman’s dream Unmarried, but they agreed on one important point, which is that she is worthy of praise in all his visions. Girl

title: How to get rid of the magic of food and drink

preview.html: Canceling magic and extracting what is eaten or drunk from the stomach by expelling it from the mouth after knowing the signs and symptoms of eaten magic through the Qur’an and herbs. Chew for seven days before going to bed, then drink ginger sweetened with honey, black seed, and sweetened (and a rope, bundle, or hair may come out of you). On the morning of the fifth day, listen to the magic, then drink Zamzam water and pour it on an empty stomach and more of it. Then drink fresh milk with the verses of magic and Surat Al-Zalzalah, then drink a cup of olive oil, then slowly put your finger in your mouth, and, God willing, relief will come to you and you will excrete the magic, and it will often emit a scent. Very unpleasant. Repeat the method on the sixth day, and you will notice that only a little came out, and on the seventh day repeat it until everyone comes out. Preparation method: Senna Makki is eaten (like gum) and it is dry paper without cooking. It is washed only with Zamzam water, meaning that the paper is slightly damp and clean. Of dirt, it is affected by water, and verses are read over it. Magic verses are read over it to make it more beneficial. One of the common mistakes is drinking Mexican senna water, but the right thing to do is to eat about thirty to forty leaves a day. Boiling Meccan senna water and drinking it causes diarrhea and dehydration without benefiting from the fiber. contained in the leaf, and this method is wrong. It is preferable to chew the grass and it does not cause diarrhea and many cramps for 7 days, and every day from thirty to forty leaves. We bring a cup of ginger sweetened with a spoon of honey mixed with a sweetened and sugary black seed. We use sidr honey or bee honey and mix a grain with it. Black and rub its sweetness with a spoon and mix it in a large container (and read inside and it swells more) and every day we mix it with ginger and eat it on an empty stomach or its effect is stronger and honey drink it with ginger after sanamil at night before going to sleep and in the morning fresh milk (without mixing anything with it) just read Al-Baqarah and the verses on magic and magic. And the earthquake, then a cup of olive oil containing the magic verses and repeating the seven verses for heroes (God nullifies. He - She) One of the sisters tried the recipe and said: In fact, I read the verses about Heroes of Magic 67 times over a cup of water and said that God will cancel it a lot. Then I took a small amount of boiling water and put 30 leaves from Mecca and said I will take it in the evening because I will fast on the second day, but for God’s sake. When I drank it, chewed it, and drank it with boiling water, it did not stay in my stomach for 3 minutes and I threw it away. Water and the food you ate an hour ago. An easy recipe to get rid of the magic that you eat or drink - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting an ear in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off part of the ear in a dream in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off an ear in a dream: Cutting off an ear in a dream may indicate great corruption that the dreamer is suffering from during his life at that time. If one sees that he is cutting off part of his ear This may indicate a major sin that he commits and he must repent and return to the Blessed and Almighty. If one sees that he is cutting off a small part of his ear, this may indicate some deception that the dreamer is suffering from and must be prevented. A dream about a person cutting off part of his ear in a dream may indicate Indicates that he distanced himself from the people in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting green beans in a dream: Cutting beans may indicate the ability of a visionary to achieve his goals and ambitions. Anyone who dreams that he is cutting green beans may indicate good changes in his life during Those days. If someone sees that he is cutting green beans, this may indicate a competition in which the dreamer participates to achieve his goals. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting green beans, this may indicate the enormous livelihood that the dreamer will obtain during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of cutting a bag in a dream: Anyone who dreams that the bag is torn indicates a difficult period that the dreamer will face in his life during those days. Dreaming of tearing a bag in a dream may indicate that there are some problems and fears for the dreamer during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting the bag may It indicates some changes that occurred in the dreamer’s life during that period. Whoever dreams that he is tearing up the bag in a dream may indicate some of the financial obstacles that the dreamer will face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting money in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is tearing up money may indicate That he will face very difficult days during that period. If someone sees that he is cutting money, this may indicate some diseases that the dreamer may be exposed to, and he will get rid of them soon. If someone sees that he is cutting money, this may indicate that he will overcome some The tribulations he was facing in his work at that time, and God knows best. Seeing money torn apart could indicate the severing of family ties or foresight on the part of some people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting turkey meat in a dream may indicate that anyone who dreams of cutting turkey meat in... A dream indicates good things happening to the dreamer in his life. Whoever dreams of cutting turkey meat may indicate achieving goals and ambitions, thanks to God. A person’s dream that he is cutting turkey meat in a dream may indicate happy events happening to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. And in the event that he sees If a person cuts turkey meat, this may indicate material gains or achieving goals and ambitions in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting an engagement ring in a dream: Seeing a broken engagement ring in a dream may indicate some wrong actions by the dreamer. It may indicate to anyone who dreams that His engagement ring is split in half into each other

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see cabbage in a dream in detail. Cabbage or cabbage is one of the types of vegetables and can have great health benefits and is characterized by a sweet and delicious taste. It is one of the famous Egyptian dishes, in addition to many important health benefits. Cabbage must be cooked, especially in the winter. . Because it gives the body energy and vitality, but what are the indications of seeing cabbage in a dream? It is clear that the interpretation of cabbage refers to the significance of the reality of the matter, and for this reason we explain the interpretation of a dream about cabbage for a man, pregnant, married, single. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cabbage by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that Whoever sees himself holding a cabbage seed in his hand, this indicates that he wants to achieve something that is difficult to achieve, and it also says that whoever sees himself planting cabbage seeds in his house, this indicates the healing of a sick person inside. Home. Cabbage is a healing. It is said that if a barren man sees himself eating cabbage, this indicates his recovery and the birth of children. Cabbage in a dream is generally evidence of a cruel and hard-hearted person, and in a dream cabbage indicates saved money and enormous wealth. Seeing cabbage as interpreted by some Scientists are evidence of piety and repentance. Interpretation of a dream about cabbage for a single woman: If the dreamer about cabbage is an unmarried woman, this means that he will present her with a rough and striving son-in-law. Cabbage shows a violent peculiarity and can symbolize an unmarried woman who does not like to reveal her secrets and personal matters. He prefers to stay away from others and tends to be isolated. If you see yourself buying cabbage in one dream, this indicates your social intelligence, in addition to the presence of many connections and the correct opinion on many topics. Seeing cooking and eating cabbage in a dream for a single girl is one of the good dreams for Her. Also, to see in a dream that he is planting cabbage, it means that he will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about cabbage for a married woman: Seeing a married woman cabbage in a dream means kindness and sustenance, but after hardship and fatigue. Interpretation of dreams to see cabbage in a married woman’s dream also symbolizes a stubborn husband For a married woman to dream of a cabbage crop means that she will soon become pregnant. While a married woman dreams that she is watering cabbage or cabbage seeds, this indicates goodness and a lot of money that she will obtain. The cabbage in her dream also shows her violent suffering with her partner, who has exhausting qualities such as stubbornness. And cruelty. But if she sees that she will buy cabbage, this indicates her recovery from an illness or the relief of her pain. Dream interpretations of cabbage for a pregnant woman. As for the interpretation of a dream about cabbage for a pregnant woman in a dream, it indicates that she will get rid of the problems of pregnancy and that she will give birth to a stubborn son, but the birth will be easy. Interpretation of a dream about cabbage For a man: A man who sees cabbage in his dream indicates that he will acquire abundant wealth. Fresh green cabbage in a dream indicates blessing and goodness. Eating cabbage in a man’s dream is also a good vision and good news for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about planting cabbage: Cultivation of cabbage

title: Learn about the interpretation of nails in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about putting nails

preview.html: Many girls care about their nails and always want to add the best types of nail polish. Changing the color of nails usually symbolizes a health problem, so it is natural that seeing nails in a dream has many connotations and meanings, and today we will point out the most important of them according to what major commentators mentioned. Nails in a dream Interpretation Dreaming about nails is evidence of the dreamer’s behavior. If the nails are well-groomed and have thin edges, this indicates that the dreamer is upright and has good morals. However, if the nails are dirty and unkempt, then this indicates rude morals. But if the nails in the dream look good and elegant. In a sick person’s dream, this is evidence that he will recover soon and enjoy health, well-being, and a long life. However, if the nails are very fragile and have many scratches and wounds, this indicates that the dreamer cannot overcome his current poor health condition, and it may be the cause of his death, and God knows best. Seeing very brittle nails with many scratches in a man’s dream means that he will be exposed to accumulating debts, and nail ulcers symbolize dismissal from work. Great wealth. Nails in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Very hard nails in a dream symbolize that the dreamer needs more sacrifices and puts in a lot of effort to be able to realize his dreams and ultimately achieve his goals. And God knows best. As for whoever dreams that he is filing his nails in a dream, this is evidence that he will be able to get rid of the problems that dominate his life at the present time and that he will also be able to forget the past with all its sorrows. And pains, every relationship is always reckless. As for whoever dreams that he paints his nails an attractive color, this indicates that he will face many good days in which he will find the fulfillment of all his dreams and achieve his goals that he has always worked for in the previous years. His death, and God knows best. Looking at short nails, as the scholar Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer will gain benefit for himself and those around him in the coming days. Nails in a single woman’s dream. Seeing nails in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will be associated with a person with high morals and skill in dealing in the coming days. On the other hand, she is an ambitious person who always wants to reach the highest positions. Scratches in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that she will be associated with a corrupt person who will make her life hell, and it is better for her to end the relationship before she reaches marriage. Neat and organized nails in a woman’s dream indicate that she will take many positive steps in the coming period of her life and will be able to achieve her goals, If she is looking for a job, the dream indicates that you will find a suitable job opportunity. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write: Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting nails? For single women? Seeing nails cut in one dream indicates enjoying good morals, good behavior among people, and prosperity. Interprets Ibn
